documentation.text: @notice Keep records for each tip transfer as tiptransferId.
@dev The tiptransferId (key) and TipTransfer object (value) are initialized on the mapping (hash table).

@notice Emit when a tip transfer completes.
 @param from sender address
@notice @dev Confirms tip has transfered to the sender.
@notice @dev Fallback function - Called if other functions don't match call or sent ether without data.
@notice Keep records for each tip transfer as tiptransferId.
@dev The tiptransferId (key) and TipTransfer object (value) are initialized on the mapping (hash table).

@notice Emit when a tip transfer completes.
 @param from sender address
@notice @dev Confirms tip has transfered to the sender.
@notice @dev Fallback function - Called if other functions don't match call or sent ether without data.

devdoc.author: Shradha Rajmane
devdoc.details: @notice This contract allows :               1. Enable tip transfer in the form of ether from one account to another account.               2. Keep records for each tip transfer as tiptransferId.                3. Share sender's account balance post tip transcation.

params.amt: Tip amount to transfer in ether

params._tiptransferId: unique identifier (UID) of this smart contract.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

tip_transfer_records.details: The tiptransferId (key) and TipTransfer object (value) are initialized on the mapping (hash table).

devdoc.title: Tipping Smart Contract

TransferConfirmed(address).notice: Emit when a tip transfer completes.

TransferInitiated(address,address).notice: Emit when a user initate the tip transfer.

TipTransferInitiated(address,uint256).notice: @dev Initiate Tip transfer on the blockchain.

confirmTransfer().notice: @dev Confirms tip has transfered to the sender.

getTipAmount(uint256).notice: @dev Get the balance of the sender or receiver of this transaction.
